comment.body:
Ha, interesting. Zeronet seems a little unstable still. It generally works just fine, but sometimes strange stuff happens :)
Considering how well it works, and how much progress has been made in such a short time, I'm sure that it will continue to improve.
I often watch PyCon videos, and some of my favorite speakers do this (David Beazley, for example). It's quite interesting and informative to watch, but you have to be fast enough to keep the pace up!
